groupId.description: The group ID. The `API_KEY` must have admin access to this group.

$ul: **requestAccess**: Can only be updated if `API_KEY` has edit access to request access settings.
**enabled**: Choose whether a user may request access to Snyk orgs in this group that they are not a member of.

**sessionLength**: The new session length for the group in minutes. This must be an integer between 1 and 43200 (30 days). Setting this value to null will result in this group inheriting from the global default of 30 days.
